name: System Eventlog Cleared
description: One of the Windows Core Eventlogs has been cleared. e.g. caused by "wevtutil cl" command execution
false_positives: Rollout of log collection agents (the setup routine often includes a reset of the local Eventlog)
System provisioning (system reset before the golden image creation)
query: (winlog.channel:System AND event.code:104 AND winlog.provider_name:/[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ll][Oo][Gg]/ AND winlog.channel:(System OR Security OR Application))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND event.code:104 AND winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-Eventlog AND winlog.channel:(System OR Security OR Application))`
